channel.title: Zion-PvP
channel.description:
[center][img]http://img10.imageshack.us/img10/5968/35128241.png[/img][/center]
[center]Hello, welcome to the development of Zion-PvP, this server has been developed for several weeks now, I'm just now deciding to make it a full on project that will be hosted.[/center]
Join us! @ http://zion-pvp.com/
[center][size=24pt][u][b]The Team[/b][/u][/size] • Myself - Lead Developer • imsuperman05 - Co-Developer • artem543 - Head Client Developer, Media Artist, Forums Developer [/center]
[center][size=24pt][u][b]About[/b][/u][/size] This project has just been a little side project to try and clean up this piece of shit server, and now I want to make it a full on project, everything is coming along good there was and currently still is code being removed & rewritten daily! Most of the content in this server either has been completely been removed or rewritten. This server will be a 'pk-only' server; you will get items by spawning, other more rare items you will get through the point shops, there are a few minigames that are in development that deal with 'pking.' [/center]
[center][size=24pt][u][b]Goals[/b][/u][/size] • Think of a smart, excellent design for player handling. (Then put it to work) • Remove the old out-dated MINA and implement NIO. • Most EVERYTHING functional (other than skills, etc.) • Custom Map Data • Documented to the fullest extent • Excellent combat system • Custom Interfaces / content to go with the theme (Pking) [/center]
[center][size=24pt][u][b]Media[/b][/u][/size] [img]http://img3.imageshack.us/img3/4329/capturedho.png[/img] [img]http://img810.imageshack.us/img810/7131/2capturek.png[/img] [img]http://img209.imageshack.us/img209/4954/20120126180422.png[/img] [/center]

item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

[quote=“imsuperman05, post:76, topic:430249”][quote author=AtomicInt_ link=topic=532928.msg3907706#msg3907706 date=1328396521]
Remember when you all said PI cannot be fixed?


[/quote]
fix the char[/quote]

Nah that’s really good, even though you probably just removed a lot of shit. Most servers without a memory leak use anywhere from 10million bytes to like 25 million, and that’s without a memory leak. His is only using 244k.

Read full topic

item.title: Zion-PvP
item.dc:creator: @Advocatus Advocatus
item.description:
@Advocatus wrote:

[quote=“artem543, post:62, topic:430249”][quote author=AtomicInt_ link=topic=532928.msg3900197#msg3900197 date=1327699195]
Oh. Shit. Works for me? Sec I’ll look into it.
[/quote]
Yeah i think its something… When your online it does not work. and when your comming back it works. And fix the InData. some packet problem on login…[/quote]

just pass the inData buffer from the LoginSession --> Player class. That happened because multiple people were editing the player class at once. This just serves as an example that dropbox is not the best option for version control.

Read full topic
